content.content: 跌倒是美國醫院中最常通報的成人不良事件。[^103]  ![fall out of bed](//images.ctfassets.net/xbvvg00rroa3/wJZBv2QU06eKcLp05Emvd/4ba0dd3d8e36aaac13128f6421b8039b/fall_out_of_bed.jpg) 美國每年約有 11,000 名住院病人死於跌倒。[^103] ## 跌倒預防 Embedded content: https://youtu.be/MhPFCRLevY0 1. 請人一週 7 天、一天 24 小時隨時陪著病人。如果病人有跌倒風險，請勿讓病人獨處。[^7][^10] Embedded content: https://youtu.be/GvX0AYUqeI0?list=LL31GglpqkW9B1NW8eHUZ-CA [美國國家醫學圖書館提供的「跌倒資訊」](https://www.nlm.nih.gov/medlineplus/falls.html) 2. 下床前尋求幫助。請使用您的呼叫燈。如果您感到頭暈、想睡或不像自己平常的樣子，請不要走路。[^7] ![Call light](//images.ctfassets.net/xbvvg00rroa3/4CdrMBsvYQemEkGW06AAqk/6bf5524a457e19aba2aeff90f846e5cc/Call_light.jpg) 3. 在醫師允許後，盡早讓病人安全地恢復行動。請穿合腳的防滑拖鞋或鞋子。如果您或您的親人想要走到浴室，請清除房間內的障礙物。確保有助行器或手杖等輔助器材，供病人在需要時使用。[^7] ![walkers](https://cdn2.hubspot.net/hub/114266/file-16410688-png/images/c--documents_and_settings-ninar-desktop-walkers_and_assistive_devices_sm.png) 4. 回到床上前，請先脫下穿在襪子外面的拖鞋，因為拖鞋可挾帶地板上的病菌。[^7] [^7]: Hallisey J. The Empowered Patient® hospital guide for patients and families. Empowered Patient website. http://engagedpatients.org/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/empowered_patient_hospital_guide.pdf. Published 2009. Updated 2012. Accessed May 10, 2015. [^99]: Currie LM, Fall and injury prevention. Patient Safety & Quality, An Evidence-based Handbook for Nurses. Rochelle, MD: Agency for Healthcare Research & Quality; 2008:195-250. AHRQ Publication No. 08-0043. https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/books/NBK2653/pdf/ch10.pdf. Accessed on May 8, 2015.
